title: 394: How to Connect with Plant Allies + Lucid Dream with Adriana Ayales
itunes:title: 394: How to Connect with Plant Allies + Lucid Dream with Adriana Ayales
description:
Did you know plants are here as allies to support us with our spiritual growth?! In this episode, we speak about various herbs, how the plants communicate with us, picking the right ones for you, when to know you’ve graduated from a plant, how plants grow in regions where people need them, boosting your mood with various herbs, divine feminine herbology and how to lucid dream with the help of blue lotus. For all you green witches, medicine womben and healers. You’re going to love this episode!

Create a thriving career as a Certified Soul Purpose Coach at Dharma Coaching Institute. Learn more: dharmacoachinginstitute.com

Try Betterhelp for 10% off at www.betterhelp.com/sahara

Get $20 off first order with Thrive Market by visiting thrivemarket.com/sahara

Get 15% off your BluBlox pair at www.blublox.com/sahara

Join Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective all about embodying the Goddess within at www.RoseGoldGoddesses.com

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at:
Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose
Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books: www.iamsahararose.com/books
